DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this exploratory sub-study was to evaluate from a clinical perspective the impact on disease activity of lowering the dose of abatacept from 10 mg/kg to 5 mg/kg in subjects who had achieved remission (Disease Activity Score 28 [DAS 28]-erythrocyte sedimentation rate [ESR] < 2.6) at Day 701 of study IM101023.
DOC.brief_title: Substudy - Low Dose of Abatacept in Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Subjects who have completed the main study, are willing to participate and have a DAS 28 ESR score of < 2.6 on Day 701 of the main study
